00006 EagleLinkedListItem* EagleLinkedListItem_New(void *obj, EagleBoolean freeObj, void (*free)(void *obj))
00007 {
00008     EagleLinkedListItem *item = (EagleLinkedListItem*) EagleMemory_Allocate("EagleLinkedListItem_New.1", sizeof(EagleLinkedListItem));
00009     if(NULL == item) {
00010         return NULL;
00011     }
00012     
00013     item->obj = obj;
00014     item->freeObj = freeObj;
00015     item->next = NULL;
00016     item->free = free;
00017

00021 EagleLinkedList* EagleLinkedList_New(void)
00022 {
00023     EagleLinkedList *list = (EagleLinkedList*) EagleMemory_Allocate("EagleLinkedList_New.1", sizeof(EagleLinkedList));
00024     if(NULL == list) {
00025         return NULL;
00026     }
00027     
00028     list->first = NULL;
00029     list->last = NULL;
00030     list->length = 0;
00031     list->modifyLock = EagleSynchronizer_CreateLock();
00032     
00033     return list;
00034 }

00036 void EagleLinkedList_add(EagleLinkedList *list, EagleLinkedListItem *item)
00037 {
00038     if(NULL == item) {
00039         return;
00040     }
00041     
00042     EagleSynchronizer_Lock(list->modifyLock);
00043     if(NULL == list->last) {
00044         list->last = list->first = item;
00045     }
00046     else {
00047         EagleLinkedListItem *current = list->last;
00048         current->next = item;
00049         current = current->next;
00050         list->last = current;
00051     }
00052     ++list->length;
00053     EagleSynchronizer_Unlock(list->modifyLock);
00054 }

00056 int EagleLinkedList_length(EagleLinkedList *list)
00057 {
00058     int length;
00059     EagleSynchronizer_Lock(list->modifyLock);
00060     length = list->length;
00061     EagleSynchronizer_Unlock(list->modifyLock);
00062     return length;
00063 }

00065 void EagleLinkedList_Delete(EagleLinkedList *list)
00066 {
00067     EagleLock_Delete(list->modifyLock);
00068     EagleMemory_Free(list);
00069 }

00071 void EagleLinkedList_DeleteWithItems(EagleLinkedList *list)
00072 {
00073     EagleLinkedListItem *p, *next;
00074     EagleSynchronizer_Lock(list->modifyLock);
00075     
00076     for(p = list->first; NULL != p; p = next) {
00077         next = p->next;
00078         EagleLinkedListItem_Delete(p);
00079     }
00080     
00081     EagleSynchronizer_Unlock(list->modifyLock);
00082     EagleLinkedList_Delete(list);
00083 }
00084 
00085 void EagleLinkedListItem_Delete(EagleLinkedListItem *item)
00086 {
00087     if(item->freeObj) {
00088         if(NULL == item->free) {
00089             EagleMemory_Free(item->obj);
00090         }
00091         else {
00092             item->free(item->obj);
00093         }
00094     }
00095     EagleMemory_Free(item);
00096 }

00098 EagleLinkedListItem* EagleLinkedList_begin(EagleLinkedList *list)
00099 {
00100     EagleLinkedListItem *first = NULL;
00101     EagleSynchronizer_Lock(list->modifyLock);
00102     first = list->first;
00103     EagleSynchronizer_Unlock(list->modifyLock);
00104     return first;
00105 }

00107 EagleLinkedListItem* EagleLinkedList_end(EagleLinkedList *list)
00108 {
00109     EagleLinkedListItem *head = NULL;
00110     EagleSynchronizer_Lock(list->modifyLock);
00111     head = list->last;
00112     EagleSynchronizer_Unlock(list->modifyLock);
00113     return head;
